scripts.say: Hahahah... You're here at last, Resistance. I've been waiting for you. My name is Shadow Eye Blizzard Fox.
Whew... it's a giant Fubuki?!
So you're the last ace up Tester's sleeve!
No, Zuikaku, look! Her riggings include Tester's!
How perceptive, Kawakaze. That's right. Tester, in her incomplete state, was merely a pawn in my plans to use this Mirror Sea. I simply eliminated her because she got in the way.
What?! Making a Siren... into her pawn?!
Ahahahaha! Serves you right, creep! Anyway, if we defeat you, then this entire sea area is going to fall apart?!
Now now, calm down a little bit. That "Tessy" does seem to like interacting with you bunch, am I right?
My plan will allow you all to survive! After all, my designs are much grander in scale!
... I don't get it.
Apparently, the gateway that formed between worlds as a result of this Mirror Sea caused many unexpected things to happen to the Sirens, and that in turn gave birth to me.
Take a closer look at your surroundings. The Hololive Headquarters still stands, and look at the manifestation of Siren technology! With this power, you can create as many "pieces" as you desire!
"Pieces" are excellent. They can do just about anything for you. There's no limit to how many you can produce, and the more there are, the greater the variance of the projects you can carry out!

At the same time, iterating upon different attributes to satisfy the tastes of fans around the world will generate a near infinite stream of revenue, thus removing worries about monetization! The power of science is truly intoxicating!!
Am I not a genius for coming up with this? Ahahaha!
You intend to... keep the Mirror Sea for yourself?!

Oh, but that's not all. In addition to manufacturing "pieces," I can control the weather, monitor other dimensions, or even predict the future with simulations. If I can expand my influence around the world, then I can become the true ruler of humanity!
When that time comes, Hololive Headquarters will manage every form of human entertainment in this world! I will reign over all VTubers!
Oh, that's right, KAN-SEN and VTubers who are not "pieces" never have to worry about not having work.
The endless battle between your kind and the Sirens shall become a permanent classic with daily updates! Ahahahaha!
She's completely out of her mind...! As expected, Siren technology is far too dangerous!
We'll never let anyone try to enslave humanity using the Mirror Seas ever again!
But, you can't win all by yourself. No matter how many "pieces" you summon, nobody wants to fight the same enemies over and over again...
Hold up, Fubuki! Step back, everyone, and just leave it to Matsuri!
Ahem! Shadow Eye Blizzard Fox! I understand your sentiments!
However, there is just one flaw in your plan! And that is - what if you made a "piece" that has the same ego as you?
Yamada Hermione, Miokawa Iiyo, Kakitsubata Nakiri, Ma Tsu Ri, and Shi O N, and the super-charismatic version of Miss Sora...
If they're anything like you, they'll never be satisfied with being your subordinate!
...! You, you're right! I forgot about what I did!
How perceptive of you to detect the flaw in my plans! Gather here, my "pieces!"
Um, if I remember properly, you mess with the database here, initiate the "piece" data... like that!
I thought we already defeated Matsuri's clone...?
Ahhh! Their personality data has disappeared!
It's true! They're not moving at all!
Ahem! Do you see now, Shadow Eye Blizzard Fox?
If your ambitions do not value the feelings of others, you can't make the world a happier place, no matter how many "pieces" you make!
Gah... Even if that's the case, I still have the power of the Hololive Headquarters...!
No! Hololive is not yours alone!
The parents that created us, the staff, and the support of the fans... Everyone comes together to make Hololive what it is!
Nooooo...!! Curse you, Hololive Resistance...!!
